mapper.insert: insert into uploadfile (contentType, fileName, filePath, regDate, saveFileName,size) values( #{contentType}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{regDate}, #{saveFileName}, #{size} )
mapper.select: select fileId, contentType, fileName, filePath, regDate, saveFileName,size from uploadfile
select fileId, contentType, fileName, filePath, regDate, saveFileName,size from uploadfile where fileId = #{fileId}
